titleStmt.title: Altum silentium or, silence the duty of saints, under every sad providence. An occasional sermon preached after the death of a daughter, by her father: viz. / By John Durant preacher of the gospel in Christ's-Church Canterbury.
titleStmt.author: John Durant, b. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Streater, and are to be sold in Popes-head-Ally, near Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The silent soul, under sorest tryals.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
